005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.impl.AnyUriItemImpl;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IAtomicOrUnionType;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
014
015import java.net.URI;
016
017import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
018
019/**
020 * An atomic Metapath item containing a URI data value.
021 */
022public interface IAnyUriItem extends IAnyAtomicItem {
023  /**
024   * Get the type information for this item.
025   *
026   * @return the type information
027   */
028  @NonNull
029  static IAtomicOrUnionType<IAnyUriItem> type() {
030    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.URI.getItemType();
031  }
032
033  @Override
034  default IAtomicOrUnionType<? extends IAnyUriItem> getType() {
035    return type();
036  }
037
038  /**
039   * Construct a new URI item using the provided string {@code value}.
040   *
041   * @param value
042   *          a string representing a URI
043   * @return the new item
044   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
045   *           if the given string violates RFC2396
046   */
047  @NonNull
048  static IAnyUriItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
049    try {
050      return valueOf(MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.URI.parse(value));
051    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
052      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
053          null,
054          String.format("Invalid URI value '%s'. %s",
055              value,
056              ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
057          ex);
058    }
059  }
060
061  /**
062   * Construct a new URI item using the provided URI {@code value}.
063   * <p>
064   * Example usage:
065   *
066   * <pre>
067   * URI uri = URI.create("http://example.com");
068   * IAnyUriItem item = IAnyUriItem.valueOf(uri);
069   * </pre>
070   *
071   * @param value
072   *          a URI
073   * @return the new item as a {@link IAnyUriItem} if the URI is absolute or
074   *         opaque, otherwise as an {@link IUriReferenceItem}
075   */
076  @NonNull
077  static IAnyUriItem valueOf(@NonNull URI value) {
078    IAnyUriItem retval;
079    if (value.isAbsolute() || value.isOpaque()) {
080      retval = new AnyUriItemImpl(value);
081    } else {
082      retval = IUriReferenceItem.valueOf(value);
083    }
084    return retval;
085  }
086
087  /**
088   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
089   *
090   * @param item
091   *          the item to cast
092   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
093   *         cast to this type
094   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
095   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
096   */
097  @NonNull
098  static IAnyUriItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
099    try {
100      return item instanceof IAnyUriItem
101          ? (IAnyUriItem) item
102          : valueOf(item.asString());
103    } catch (IllegalStateException | InvalidTypeMetapathException ex) {
104      // asString can throw IllegalStateException exception
105      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(ex);
106    }
107  }
108
109  @Override
110  default IAnyUriItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
111    return cast(item);
112  }
113
114  /**
115   * Get the "wrapped" URI value.
116   *
117   * @return the underlying URI value
118   */
119  @NonNull
120  URI asUri();
121
122  /**
123   * Determines if this URI has a scheme component, making it absolute.
124   *
125   * @return {@code true} if the URI is absolute, or {@code false} otherwise
126   */
127  default boolean isAbsolute() {
128    return asUri().isAbsolute();
129  }
130
131  /**
132   * Determines if this URI is opaque.
133   *
134   * @return {@code true} if the URI is opaque, or {@code false} otherwise
135   * @see URI#isOpaque()
136   */
137  default boolean isOpaque() {
138    return asUri().isOpaque();
139  }
140
141  /**
142   * Resolve the provided URI against this URI.
143   *
144   * @param other
145   *          the URI to resolve
146   * @return the resolved URI
147   * @see URI#resolve(URI)
148   */
149  @NonNull
150  default IAnyUriItem resolve(@NonNull IAnyUriItem other) {
151    return valueOf(ObjectUtils.notNull(asUri().resolve(other.asUri())));
152  }
153
154  @Override
155  default int compareTo(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
156    return compareTo(cast(item));
157  }
158
159  /**
160   * Compares this value with the argument.
161   *
162   * @param item
163   *          the item to compare with this value
164   * @return a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer if this value is less
165   *         than, equal to, or greater than the {@code item}.
166   */
167  default int compareTo(@NonNull IAnyUriItem item) {
168    return asUri().compareTo(item.asUri());
169  }
170}
